text: (jab) musharikeen ne khud ehad shikanee (toda) kee to un ka koee ehado paimaan khuda ke nazadeek aur usake rasool ke nazadeek kyonkar (qaayam) rah sakata hai magar jin logon se tumane khaanae kaaba ke paas muaaheda kiya tha to vah log (apanee ehado paimaan) tumase qaayam rakhana chaahen to tum bhee un se (apana ehad) qaayam rakho beshak khuda (bad ehadee se) parahez karane vaalon ko dost rakhata hai
